text: "Most CEOs I talk to say we're in a recession right now."
author: Blackrock CEO, Larry Fink

text: "The Fed will keep at it until the job is done."
author: Federal Reserve Chair, Jerome Powell

text: "Markets are trading as if we're going to have a soft landing. I'm not convinced."
author: JPMorgan CEO, Jamie Dimon

text: "The AI revolution is the most profound tech transformation in our lifetimes."
author: NVIDIA CEO, Jensen Huang

text: "Interest rates are the price of money. We're resetting the price of money from zero."
author: BlackRock CIO, Rick Rieder

text: "We're seeing a significant shift away from just-in-time to just-in-case supply chains."
author: Maersk CEO, Vincent Clerc

text: "In AI, we are in the first minute of the first day of the first inning."
author: Coinbase CEO, Brian Armstrong

text: "In AI, we are in the first minute of the first day of the first inning."
author: Microsoft CEO, Satya Nadella

text: "This is not just a cycle. What we are going through is a fundamental restructuring of the global economy."
author: Tesla CEO, Elon Musk
